projects.title: Wabi-Sabi Design System
projects.description: Component library embracing imperfection and asymmetry
projects.fullDescription: A comprehensive design system and component library inspired by wabi-sabi philosophy. This project embraces imperfection, asymmetry, and natural textures to create digital interfaces that feel more human and authentic.
